name: Pic Copilot
description: Pic Copilot is an AI-powered platform designed to enhance e-commerce product images and marketing visuals for improved click-through rates and conversions.
longDescription: Pic Copilot, developed by Alibaba's international AI team, is an innovative platform tailored for e-commerce businesses to create professional-grade product images and marketing visuals. It leverages advanced AI technologies to simplify and accelerate the image editing process, addressing common challenges like costly photoshoots and time-consuming design workflows. The platform offers tools such as background removal, virtual try-on, and AI-generated templates, enabling users to produce high-quality visuals in seconds. Its mission is to empower small businesses and entrepreneurs by reducing design costs and boosting online store performance. By providing both free and premium plans, Pic Copilot caters to a wide range of users, from startups to established brands. The platform has been praised for increasing click-through rates and conversions through visually appealing, AI-optimized content.
features: AI Background Generator creates professional product backgrounds to enhance visual appeal and increase click-through rates.
Background Removal instantly eliminates image backgrounds for clean, professional product photos.
Virtual Try-On allows users to generate realistic images of apparel or shoes on models, improving customer engagement.
AI Model Swap enables users to place products on custom or pre-selected AI-generated models for accurate representation.
Fashion Reels transforms product images into dynamic videos with AI-synced music to showcase design details.
Watermark Removal cleans images of unwanted watermarks for seamless branding and marketing.
Image Text Translation converts text in images to support multilingual campaigns, streamlining global marketing.
AI Ads Creative Generator produces high-quality ad visuals tailored for platforms like Instagram and TikTok.
AI Fashion Templates provide thousands of customizable e-commerce templates to reduce design time.
Image Enhancer improves photo quality with AI-driven adjustments for sharpness and clarity.

faqs.question: What is Pic Copilot used for?
faqs.answer: Pic Copilot is an AI-powered tool for e-commerce businesses to create and edit product images, generate marketing visuals, and enhance online store appeal.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Pic Copilot offers a free plan with 25 Pcoins for basic features like ad graphics creation and background removal.

faqs.question: Can I use generated images for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, images created by Pic Copilotâ€™s AI tools can be used for commercial purposes, including marketing and product promotions.

faqs.question: What payment methods are supported for Pro plans?
faqs.answer: Pic Copilot supports secure payment methods like UnionPay, Visa, Mastercard, American Express, JCB, and Alipay, with monthly or yearly billing options.

faqs.question: Does Pic Copilot offer a trial for premium plans?
faqs.answer: Yes, first-time Pro Plan subscribers get a 7-day free trial with full access to all Pro features, with a refund option during the trial.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my subscription?
faqs.answer: Upgrades between plans are supported instantly, but downgrades are not currently available in real-time.

faqs.question: Is there an API for businesses?
faqs.answer: Yes, Pic Copilot offers a business API/SDK solution for large-scale requirements; details are available on their API/SDK page.

faqs.question: How does Virtual Try-On work?
faqs.answer: Users upload apparel or shoe images, select a model, and the AI generates realistic visuals of the product being worn, enhancing customer experience.
